title: Sofía Vergara Addresses Modern Family Reboot and Shares How Her Upbringing Prepared Her for Griselda
user: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon

meta.description:
Sofía Vergara dishes on wanting to spend more time in New York because of the single men, the Modern Family reunion that she had at her house and how her upbringing in Colombia prepared her to play Griselda Blanco.

The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon.  Stream now on Peacock: https://bit.ly/3gZJaNy

comments.text: Sofía, I watched Griselda with my husband in Ireland and we both were mesmerised by your performance! Then I showed him what you really look like and he was like WOW.😮 We're your fans 100% and I'm proud to be Latina because of hardworking Latinas like you and me! We kill it everywhere we set foot. ❤
